content:
I'm glad you found the recommendations helpful!

Remember, taking care of your mom's health and well-being is a top priority, and using these resources can help you manage her care more effectively. Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns.

Also, don't forget to take care of yourself during this time. Caring for a loved one can be challenging, so make sure you're getting enough rest, eating well, and taking breaks when needed.

If you need any more assistance or guidance, feel free to ask!
